name: Gems Match Mission
description:
Gems Match Mission is amazing match-3 puzzle game, it makes you keep playing for FREE!

HOW TO PLAY
• Swap and Match 3 or more jewels of the same!
• Complete the level!
• Helpful magical boosters to win jewel stars.

FEATURES
• 3 MATCH PUZZLE
• TONS OF UNIQUE LEVELS
• EASY AND FUN PLAY
• NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
